meanings.definition: Settle or find a solution to (a problem or dispute)
meanings.sent1: I will resolve the issue with my friend by talking it out.
meanings.sent2: She always tries to resolve conflicts peacefully.
meanings.sent3: The detective resolved the case with a clever twist.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to resolve the puzzle was unwavering.
meanings.sent5: He resolved the problem with a simple yet effective solution.

meanings.definition: Decide firmly on a course of action
meanings.sent1: After much thought, she resolved to pursue her dream of becoming a doctor.
meanings.sent2: He resolved to start exercising regularly to improve his health.
meanings.sent3: The cat resolved to nap in the sun all day.
meanings.sent4: She resolved to face her fears head-on.
meanings.sent5: They resolved to work together to achieve their goals.

meanings.sent1: Her resolve to succeed in her studies never wavered.
meanings.sent2: The team showed great resolve in overcoming the challenges.
meanings.sent3: His resolve to eat the entire cake was comical.
meanings.sent4: The mountain climber's resolve to reach the summit was inspiring.
meanings.sent5: Their collective resolve to make a difference was admirable.
